Interface Item

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractItem, DVDPlayer, Furniture, Television
public interface Item

This interface shows what data an item must contain to work within this system. Implementing this interface allows the item to be easily dropped into the system.

Version:
Fall 2008
Author:
Franklin University

Method Detail

calculateFee

Money calculateFee(int weeks)
Calculate the fees for renting the item for a given number of weeks.

Parameters:
weeks - the number of rental weeks
Returns:
the fee or null if the fee could not be calculated

Return the weekly rental rate for the item.

Returns:

isRented

boolean isRented()
Return the rental status of the item.

Returns:
true if the item is rented, otherwise false.

rented

Indicate the item has been rented.

returned

void returned()
Indicate the item has been returned and is no longer rented.
